original_title: 社員旅行で狙われた新人OL 3
overview: On the last day of the hot spring trip to welcome newcomers, two newcomers assigned to the general affairs department get excited when they are advised to stay one more night with a special allowance for the next hot spring trip. However, this proposal is actually an annual new cannibal event planned by seniors! !
title: A Fresh Face Office Lady Who Was Targeted During The Company Trip 3
